mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, replytext, replyer) VALUES (reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, user_name AS userName, r.regdate, r.updatedate FROM tbl_reply r, tbl_member m WHERE r.replyer = m.user_id AND bno=#{bno} ORDER BY rno
